title: 8th suspect arrested in Bunny Friend Playground shooting
content:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) -
An eighth suspect in the Bunny Friend Playground mass shooting has been arrested.
Quendrick "C4" Bailey was booked into Orleans Parish Prison Friday morning on 17 counts of attempted murder.
The lone suspect still on the loose is Shawn "Shooter" Ruffin, 22.
Detectives arrested seven other suspects, including two on Thursday.
Officers believe the men opened fire on a large crowd at the park in the 1900 block of Gallier Street on Nov. 22.
If you know anything about his whereabouts, call Crimestoppers at 504-822-1111.
